Hello Varun, 

 

It is my understanding that we are in the process of opting for insurance coverage from GIG for Havas Worldwide Middle East FZ-LLC. 

 

Adding @Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  – Hello Hagop! Can you please provide more details, if any, in this respect.

 

Thank you,

SARAH ALASADI​​​​

Hello Stefania, Trust all is well on your end. We have received the attached form from the insurance company GIG. They have requested the highlighted information to be completed, and for the following documents to be shared: VAT registration

 

Hello Stefania, 

 

Trust all is well on your end.

 

We have received the attached form from the insurance company GIG. 

 

They have requested the highlighted information to be completed, and for the following documents to be shared:

 

*	VAT registration certificate;
*	Valid ID copies of: Francois, Marie, Jean, Charles Laroze, Yannick Bollore and Dany Naaman.
*	Latest Audited Financials – they added the following note: “in case the client is not willing to share, please specify the reason”

 

Thank you!

SARAH ALASADI​​​​

SENIOR COUNSEL ‑ LEGAL

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES
